text: The Secret Life of Pets is a 2016 American movie distributed by Universal Studios and produced by Illumination Entertainment. The movie is all about pets. Louis C.K. plays Max. Eric Stonestreet plays Duke. Kevin Hart plays Snowball. Jenny Slate plays Gidget. Ellie Kemper plays Katie. == Plot == Category:2016 movies Category:2016 computer-animated movies Category:2016 comedy movies Category:The Secret Life of Pets (franchise) Category:American animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Illumination movies
title: The Secret Life of Pets
